ICE Area of Responsibility and Field Office Map

<div class="map"><img src="img/aor_map.jpg" width=500 align="center" class="aor-map"></div> 

* Hawaii is part of the San Francisco Area of Responsibility, 
* Alaska is part of the Seattle Area of Responsibility
* Puerto Rico is part of the Miami Area of Responsibility

<div style="clear: both;"></div>

<div class="map"><img src="img/aor_boxes.jpg" width=500 align="center" class="aor-map"></div> 

* The U.S. Virgin Islands are part of the Miami Area of Responsibility
* The Northern Mariana Islands and Guam are part of the San Francisco Area of Responsibility

<div style="clear: both;"></div>

ICE Field Offices by AOR

```{r}
library(tidylog)
library(reactable)
library(sf)

rds_url <- "https://github.com/deportationdata/deportationdata.org/blob/aor-map/ice_field_offices.rds"
field_offices <- readRDS(url(rds_url))

reactable(field_offices |> select(field_office = title, address, city_state, area_of_responsibility), searchable = TRUE, defaultPageSize = 5)

```

ICE Counties by AOR

```{r}
rds_url <- "https://github.com/deportationdata/deportationdata.org/blob/aor-map/ice_aor_map_data.rds"
map_data <- readRDS(url(rds_url))

reactable(map_data |> select(STATEFP, COUNTYFP, NAME, STUSPS, aor, area_of_responsibility), searchable = TRUE, defaultPageSize = 5)
```
